title: Did Seattle's chief of police say to residents: " We cannot enforce the law, you're under your command? '
subtitle: In June 2020, the Seattle City Council passed a law prohibiting police from using "crowd control weapons."
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In a letter in July 2020, Seattle Carmen Pest Chief of Police said to the population and business owners, "We cannot enforce the law. You're on your own, or words to that effect.
